Rebuilding with the GUI debugger

If you are rebuilding from source and wish to configure GDB to use the new TK-based GUI, you must use the option `--enable-gdbtk' on the command line to configure. Also see section Graphical User Interface for GDB.

For more information on rebuilding from source, see the manual Rebuilding From Source.
